summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED A COMPLETE LOSS OF ELECTRICAL POWER INTERMITTENTLY. ALL THE WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO SEMI VALLEY CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP, BUT THE DEALER COULD NOT REPLICATE THE FAILURE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE AND OFFERED NO ASSISTANCE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 110,080.
